summary: After being double-crossed and left for dead, a mysterious man named Walker single-mindedly tries to retrieve the money that was stolen from him.
cast: Lee Marvin|Angie Dickinson|Keenan Wynn|Carroll O'Connor|Lloyd Bochner|Michael Strong|John Vernon|Sharon Acker|James Sikking|Sandra Warner|Roberta Haynes|Kathleen Freeman|Victor Creatore|Lawrence Hauben|Susan Holloway|Sid Haig|Michael Bell|Priscilla Boyd|John McMurtry|Ron Walters|George Strattan|Nicole Rogell|Rico Cattani|Roland La Starza|Casey Brandon|George Bruggeman|Jerry Catron|Bud Cokes|Bonnie Dewberry|Barbara Feldon|Carey Foster|Stu Gardner|Rudy Germane|Bill Hickman|Chuck Hicks|George Hoagland|Harvey Karels|Karen Lee|Joseph Mell|Monty O'Grady|Andrew Orapeza|Anthony Redondo|Clark Ross|Cosmo Sardo|Jeffrey Sayre|Felix Silla|Robert Strong|Sid Troy|Guy Way|Ted White|Louis Whitehill|Roseann Williams
title: A quemarropa
